headline: Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Applied Materials, Inc. on Dividend Talks’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AMAT. Applied Materials, Inc.’s share was trading at $183.07 as of June 30th. AMAT’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.27 and 19.34 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Applied Materials (AMAT) stands as a […]

headline: DUV Demand Powers ASML Holding in China: Will Export Curbs Cut It Off?
summary: Strong demand for DUV lithography systems is driving sales in China, but export curbs and trade tensions threaten future momentum.

headline: Goldman Sachs bullish on LRCX, AMAT, and STX  in new semiconductor call
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs initiated coverage on U.S. semiconductor capital equipment, storage, and foundry stocks in a note Thursday, holding a “balanced view,” highlighting mid-cycle dynamics that present selective opportunities.
